PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2007-01452007-02-08,  CWB,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Wheat Board Act
PrecisAuthority for THE CANADIAN WHEAT BOARD (a) to adjust its accounts, as of October 31, 2006, by transferring the undistributed funds in the 1999-2000 pool accounts for wheat, amber durum wheat and designated barley to a separate account ; and (b) to pay to producers, out of that account, the amount to which they are entitled.
AttachmentsAttachment
